duties_responsibilities.duty: Reviewing Project Manager/Project Engineer correspondence and making final drafts for signature and proper distribution and filing.
Creating necessary electronic files for new projects and conducting project filing throughout job progress for electronic files.
Assisting Project Manager/Project Engineer with issuing subcontracts and purchase orders and ensuring contracts are returned in a timely manner.
Updating Vendor Tracker Spreadsheet and acquiring/reviewing Subcontractor’s Certificates of Insurance and forwarding to the appropriate party.
Assisting Project Manager/Project Engineer with obtaining/printing project documents and drawings and preparing and managing the Subcontractor Quarterly Evaluation.
Monitoring, reviewing, and distributing the daily Manpower report and archiving emails.
Preparing Operations & Maintenance Manuals for each project, coordinating travel for team members, and assisting with Project Closeout.
Completing Archiving Checklist Inspection, finalizing O&M Manual, copying to thumb drive/DVD, and creating a Closeout meeting in Outlook and monitoring attendance.
Monitoring Sub/supplier Report Card and issuing a final summary, as well as performing other duties as assigned.
